title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases            May 7, 2016Newly Discovered Species of Fossil River Otter Helps Rewrite Fossil Otter Origins in the AmericasHagerman Fossil Beds is pleased to announce  the discovery of a new fossil otter species.April 18, 2015  and  May 2, 2015Help the Monument GrowVolunteer to plant  native vegetation on the Monument.April 18, 2015Night Sky PartyCelebrate International Dark Sky Week by joining our Rangers for a Night Sky Party!
